snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateAppProfile Sample
snippets.description: CreateAppProfile creates an app profile within an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateCluster Sample
snippets.description:
CreateCluster creates a cluster within an instance.

Note that exactly one of Cluster.serve_nodes and
Cluster.cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config can be set. If
serve_nodes is set to non-zero, then the cluster is manually scaled. If
cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config is non-empty, then autoscaling is
enabled.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateInstance Sample
snippets.description:
CreateInstance create an instance within a project.

Note that exactly one of Cluster.serve_nodes and
Cluster.cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config can be set. If
serve_nodes is set to non-zero, then the cluster is manually scaled. If
cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config is non-empty, then autoscaling is
enabled.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteAppProfile Sample
snippets.description: DeleteAppProfile deletes an app profile from an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteCluster Sample
snippets.description: DeleteCluster deletes a cluster from an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteInstance Sample
snippets.description: DeleteInstance delete an instance from a project.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetAppProfile Sample
snippets.description: GetAppProfile gets information about an app profile.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetCluster Sample
snippets.description: GetCluster gets information about a cluster.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetIamPolicy Sample
snippets.description:
GetIamPolicy gets the access control policy for an instance resource. Returns an empty
policy if an instance exists but does not have a policy set.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetInstance Sample
snippets.description: GetInstance gets information about an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListAppProfiles Sample
snippets.description: ListAppProfiles lists information about app profiles in an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListClusters Sample
snippets.description: ListClusters lists information about clusters in an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListHotTablets Sample
snippets.description:
ListHotTablets lists hot tablets in a cluster, within the time range provided. Hot
tablets are ordered based on CPU usage.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListInstances Sample
snippets.description: ListInstances lists information about instances in a project.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin PartialUpdateCluster Sample
snippets.description:
PartialUpdateCluster partially updates a cluster within a project. This method is the preferred
way to update a Cluster.

To enable and update autoscaling, set
cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config. When autoscaling is enabled,
serve_nodes is treated as an OUTPUT_ONLY field, meaning that updates to it
are ignored. Note that an update cannot simultaneously set serve_nodes to
non-zero and cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config to non-empty, and
also specify both in the update_mask.

To disable autoscaling, clear cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config,
and explicitly set a serve_node count via the update_mask.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin PartialUpdateInstance Sample
snippets.description:
PartialUpdateInstance partially updates an instance within a project. This method can modify all
fields of an Instance and is the preferred way to update an Instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin SetIamPolicy Sample
snippets.description:
SetIamPolicy sets the access control policy on an instance resource. Replaces any
existing policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin TestIamPermissions Sample
snippets.description: TestIamPermissions returns permissions that the caller has on the specified instance resource.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateAppProfile Sample
snippets.description: UpdateAppProfile updates an app profile within an instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateCluster Sample
snippets.description:
UpdateCluster updates a cluster within an instance.

Note that UpdateCluster does not support updating
cluster_config.cluster_autoscaling_config. In order to update it, you
must use PartialUpdateCluster.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateInstance Sample
snippets.description:
UpdateInstance updates an instance within a project. This method updates only the display
name and type for an Instance. To update other Instance properties, such as
labels, use PartialUpdateInstance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CheckConsistency Sample
snippets.description:
CheckConsistency checks replication consistency based on a consistency token, that is, if
replication has caught up based on the conditions specified in the token
and the check request.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CopyBackup Sample
snippets.description:
CopyBackup copy a Cloud Bigtable backup to a new backup in the destination cluster
located in the destination instance and project.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateAuthorizedView Sample
snippets.description: CreateAuthorizedView creates a new AuthorizedView in a table.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateBackup Sample
snippets.description:
CreateBackup starts creating a new Cloud Bigtable Backup.  The returned backup
[long-running operation][google.longrunning.Operation] can be used to
track creation of the backup. The
[metadata][google.longrunning.Operation.metadata] field type is
[CreateBackupMetadata][google.bigtable.admin.v2.CreateBackupMetadata]. The
[response][google.longrunning.Operation.response] field type is
[Backup][google.bigtable.admin.v2.Backup], if successful. Cancelling the
returned operation will stop the creation and delete the backup.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateTable Sample
snippets.description:
CreateTable creates a new table in the specified instance.
The table can be created with a full set of initial column families,
specified in the request.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin CreateTableFromSnapshot Sample
snippets.description:
CreateTableFromSnapshot creates a new table from the specified snapshot. The target table must
not exist. The snapshot and the table must be in the same instance.

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This
feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This
feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not
recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation
policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteAuthorizedView Sample
snippets.description: DeleteAuthorizedView permanently deletes a specified AuthorizedView.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteBackup Sample
snippets.description: DeleteBackup deletes a pending or completed Cloud Bigtable backup.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteSnapshot Sample
snippets.description:
DeleteSnapshot permanently deletes the specified snapshot.

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This
feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This
feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not
recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation
policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DeleteTable Sample
snippets.description: DeleteTable permanently deletes a specified table and all of its data.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin DropRowRange Sample
snippets.description:
DropRowRange permanently drop/delete a row range from a specified table. The request can
specify whether to delete all rows in a table, or only those that match a
particular prefix.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GenerateConsistencyToken Sample
snippets.description:
GenerateConsistencyToken generates a consistency token for a Table, which can be used in
CheckConsistency to check whether mutations to the table that finished
before this call started have been replicated. The tokens will be available
for 90 days.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetAuthorizedView Sample
snippets.description: GetAuthorizedView gets information from a specified AuthorizedView.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetBackup Sample
snippets.description: GetBackup gets metadata on a pending or completed Cloud Bigtable Backup.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetIamPolicy Sample
snippets.description:
GetIamPolicy gets the access control policy for a Table or Backup resource.
Returns an empty policy if the resource exists but does not have a policy
set.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetSnapshot Sample
snippets.description:
GetSnapshot gets metadata information about the specified snapshot.

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This
feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This
feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not
recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation
policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin GetTable Sample
snippets.description: GetTable gets metadata information about the specified table.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListAuthorizedViews Sample
snippets.description: ListAuthorizedViews lists all AuthorizedViews from a specific table.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListBackups Sample
snippets.description:
ListBackups lists Cloud Bigtable backups. Returns both completed and pending
backups.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListSnapshots Sample
snippets.description:
ListSnapshots lists all snapshots associated with the specified cluster.

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This
feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This
feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not
recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation
policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ListTables Sample
snippets.description: ListTables lists all tables served from a specified instance.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin ModifyColumnFamilies Sample
snippets.description:
ModifyColumnFamilies performs a series of column family modifications on the specified table.
Either all or none of the modifications will occur before this method
returns, but data requests received prior to that point may see a table
where only some modifications have taken effect.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin RestoreTable Sample
snippets.description:
RestoreTable create a new table by restoring from a completed backup.  The
returned table [long-running operation][google.longrunning.Operation] can
be used to track the progress of the operation, and to cancel it.  The
[metadata][google.longrunning.Operation.metadata] field type is
[RestoreTableMetadata][google.bigtable.admin.v2.RestoreTableMetadata].  The
[response][google.longrunning.Operation.response] type is
[Table][google.bigtable.admin.v2.Table], if successful.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin SetIamPolicy Sample
snippets.description:
SetIamPolicy sets the access control policy on a Table or Backup resource.
Replaces any existing policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin SnapshotTable Sample
snippets.description:
SnapshotTable creates a new snapshot in the specified cluster from the specified
source table. The cluster and the table must be in the same instance.

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This
feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This
feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not
recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation
policy.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin TestIamPermissions Sample
snippets.description:
TestIamPermissions returns permissions that the caller has on the specified Table or Backup
resource.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UndeleteTable Sample
snippets.description: UndeleteTable restores a specified table which was accidentally deleted.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateAuthorizedView Sample
snippets.description: UpdateAuthorizedView updates an AuthorizedView in a table.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateBackup Sample
snippets.description: UpdateBackup updates a pending or completed Cloud Bigtable Backup.

snippets.title: bigtableadmin UpdateTable Sample
snippets.description: UpdateTable updates a specified table.
